mapper.select:
SELECT CUID AS USERID, CNAME, CUID FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO WHERE PUSHKEY IS NOT NULL AND APPID = #{APPID} AND PNSID IN ( SELECT PNSID FROM T_PUSH_SERVICE WHERE SERVICECODE = #{SERVICECODE} ) AND CUID != 'GUEST'
AND CUID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
GROUP BY USERID, CNAME

SELECT PSID AS USERID, CNAME, PNSID FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO WHERE PUSHKEY IS NOT NULL AND APPID = #{APPID} AND PNSID IN ( SELECT PNSID FROM T_PUSH_SERVICE WHERE SERVICECODE = #{SERVICECODE} ) AND CUID != 'GUEST'
AND PSID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
GROUP BY USERID, CNAME, PNSID

SELECT B.CUID, B.PUSHKEY, B.CNAME, B.PHONENO FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PUSH_USER_INFO AS B ON A.CUID = B.CUID WHERE B.PUSHKEY IS NOT NULL AND GROUPSEQ = #{GROUPSEQ} AND APPID = #{APPID} AND PNSID IN ( SELECT PNSID FROM T_PUSH_SERVICE WHERE SERVICECODE = #{SERVICECODE} ) AND A.CUID != 'GUEST'
AND B.CUID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND B.CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND B.PHONENO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
GROUP BY A.CUID

SELECT A.GROUPSEQ, A.GROUPNAME, B.GROUPCNT, A.GROUPDESC FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GROUPSEQ, COUNT(*) AS GROUPCNT FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP GROUP BY GROUPSEQ ) B ON A.GROUPSEQ = B.GROUPSEQ
AND A.GROUPNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND A.GROUPDESC LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
